Title: Pictures of four seasons in the rural village (3)
Designer: Xu Yongxiang (徐永祥)Lin Kangnian (林康年)Wu Delong (吳德隆)Yao Qiaoyun (姚巧云)
Publisher: Huadong renmin meishu chubanshe (华东人民美术出版社)
Notes: Third of four scrolls showing a rural village during the four seasons. This is autumn. Grain is threshed, sieved, put in sacks, weighed and brought to boats.
